definition: lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: We'll waiting for you tomorrow at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 我们明天同一时间不见不散。

sentences.english: We see tomorrow at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 让我们明天同一时间不见不散。

sentences.english: Usual place. Be there or be square.
See you at the subway station six o' clock.
sentences.chinese: 六点钟地铁站，不见不散啊。
明天同一时间不见不散。

sentences.english: We made an appointment there or be square of the time and place.
sentences.chinese: 我们约好不见不散的时间与地点。

sentences.english: We'll see you tomorrow at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 明天我们同一时间不见不散。

sentences.english: There's a huge party on Friday night; be there or be square.
sentences.chinese: 在星期五晚上有一个大型的聚会，大家不见不散。

sentences.english: Make sure that you meet us on the Caribbean street of beach in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海的加勒比海滩街区，我们不见不散。

definition: see you tomorrow/(coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to meet again/until we meet again/goodbye
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
(sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
Oh! (exclamation of dismay etc)/see 呦呦[you1 you1]
to arrive as planned/right on schedule
same place as before/usual place/stomping ground
